Introduction

Jin Longguo, also known simply as Longguo or Kim Yongguk, is a Chinese singer under Choon Entertainment. He is a former member of the project group JBJ and the unit duo Longguo & Shihyun. He made his solo debut on June 13, 2018 with the single "Clover."
